posts.name: Cru Wine Bar
posts.note: Cru Wine Bar is a relaxed, Napa-style wine-bar chain serving New American fare, stone-fired pizzas and cheese plates. In the Dallas Love Field Airport if they have it order the fig and Camembert cheese with a Balsamic reduction on bruschetta. NOTE: They have locations around Dallas and in other airports too.

posts.name: CrushCraft Thai
posts.note: CrushCraft Thai is a casual hangout that serves traditional and modern takes on Thai street food along with drinks including sake and soju.
